title: Morning Check-in
categoryTitle: Contract signed with Company C
details: Successfully finalized negotiations with Company C and signed the contract. This is the result of 3 months of negotiation.

title: Morning Review
categoryTitle: Company A proposal didn't resonate due to price point
details: Submitted proposal to Company A but received feedback that it exceeds budget. They pointed out that we're 15% higher than competitors.

title: Post-lunch Check
categoryTitle: Progress delayed waiting for B's work
details: Proposal creation for Company D is stalled waiting for B's technical specification document. Need to submit today, but B is busy with other projects.

title: Afternoon Consultation
categoryTitle: Adjust number of projects B is handling
details: B is currently handling 5 projects and is clearly over capacity. Would like to consider redistributing to other members.

title: Previous Day Achievement
categoryTitle: New lead acquired through Company E referral
details: Company E representative introduced us to another company, and a meeting is scheduled for next week. Referral sales are starting to show results.

title: Previous Day Challenge
categoryTitle: Cannot schedule meeting with Company F decision maker
details: Have good relationship with Company F point of contact, but haven't been able to schedule meeting with decision maker for 3 weeks.

title: Two Days Ago Achievement
categoryTitle: Successful first meeting with Company G
details: First meeting with Company G showed strong interest, and technical demo is scheduled for next meeting.

title: Three Days Ago Consultation
categoryTitle: Prioritization of new customer development
details: Would like to discuss balance between existing project follow-up and new customer development. Current project closing is taking up time.

title: 会社Bとの会議戦略調整
categoryTitle: Previous Price Dispute with Company B
details: In the previous meeting with Company B, there was a disagreement regarding pricing, which needs to be considered for the upcoming meeting.

title: 会社Bとの会議戦略調整
categoryTitle: Company B Meeting Strategy and Approach
details: The primary discussion is to formulate a strategy for the upcoming meeting with Company B. The proposed strategy involves presenting results first, followed by price negotiations, to address previous issues and align with the user's overall goals (interpreted as 'All my dreams'). The assistant is seeking confirmation on this approach and any additional points.

title: 商談の価格交渉戦略
categoryTitle: Friction from previous meeting with company A
details: Starting with the price point caused some friction in the last meeting with company A, leading to a desire to change the approach for the current meeting.

title: 商談の価格交渉戦略
categoryTitle: Strategy for second meeting with company A
details:
Discussion on a revised strategy for the second meeting with company A, specifically proposing 'results first 
 then price' to avoid previous friction. The assistant is also consulting on whether to outline key results together or if the user prefers to do it independently.

title: 商談の進行戦略
categoryTitle: Past friction from price-first approach
details: Last time, starting with the discussion with the price point caused some friction.

title: 商談の進行戦略
categoryTitle: Prevented premature decision at Company A meeting
details: The user actively prevented Company A from making a decision during today's meeting, as it was almost over, to avoid a potentially premature or unfavorable outcome.

title: 商談の進行戦略
categoryTitle: Proposed meeting strategy: Results first, then price
details: A new strategy is proposed for future discussions: 'results first' then 'price' to avoid past friction.

title: 商談の進行戦略
categoryTitle: Planning presentation of results
details: Discussion is needed on how to present the results. The options include running through the presentation or drafting the main points together.

title: 対話の進行と課題把握
categoryTitle: Starting with results paid off
details: Starting with the results really paid off.

title: 対話の進行と課題把握
categoryTitle: Journey caused issue
details: The journey is caused. The assistant suggests adding it to the issue list and scheduling a 1-on-1.

title: 対話の進行と課題把握
categoryTitle: Calling the system
details: User suggests to probably just call the system.

title: 報告書作成の相談
categoryTitle: Report Structure Proposal
details: The assistant proposed a basic report structure for the user, including a title, purpose/background, specific content/results, and next steps/action items. The assistant is awaiting user confirmation and further input regarding points to emphasize or specific information to include.
